#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <iomanip>
using namespace std;
double logfac[1000001];
int main()
{int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{int n,k;
cin>>n>>k;
k=min(k,n-k);
logfac[0]=0;
for(int i = 1;i<=k;i++)
{logfac[i]=logfac[i-1]+log2((long double)(n-i+1)/((long double)i));}

int z=k;
 double ans=0;
while(k>=0)
{double x=logfac[k];
long double z = pow(2,x+1-n);

ans+=z;

if(k*z<1e-3)
{break;}
k--;}
ans*=100.0;
printf("%.1f\n", ans);}
return 0;}
